explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques for credit risk evaluation.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper mentions the use of supervised classification (decision trees) in the second step of the proposed system.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper mentions the use of unsupervised classification (clustering) in the first step of the proposed system.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on building classification rules to assign bank customers as good or bad payers.
explanations.decision tree: The paper explicitly mentions the use of decision trees for defining classification rules for each group of clients.
explanations.clustering: The paper mentions the use of a clustering algorithm to segment clients into groups with similar features.
